title: Arman Ramezani
text:
Arman Ramezani () is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28football%29">forward</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Esteghlal%20F.C.">Esteghlal</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>.
Club career.
Malavan.
He joined to first team by <a href="Farhad%20Pourgholami">Farhad Pourgholami</a> and made his debut for <a href="Malavan">Malavan</a> in <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20Iran%20Pro%20League">2013–14 Iran Pro League</a> against <a href="Gahar%20Zagros%20F.C.">Gahar</a> as a substitute.
Persepolis.
On 8 September 2020, Ramezani signed a two-year contract with <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a> champions <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a>.
